item.description:
A Night of Comedy, Conversation, Music, and ACTION!
A Rally to Increase Recycling!

Sat. April 6th, 7pm
The Regent Theatre
7 Medford St., Arlington, MA

"Here's my empty water bottle- give me a nickel!!!"

Join comedian Jimmy Tingle for an evening of fun and action as he takes on the Battle for the Bottle Bill. The Bottle Bill is the state's nickel deposit on bottles, and has been around for 30 years. It's the State's most effective recycling and litter control program, but it doesn't cover water, tea, or other non-carbonated beverages. The Bottle Bill Update legislation has been stalled and blocked for 16 years!

Also on stage will be Hornography, a pop/rock/hip-hop-playing brass band based in Somerville. Tickets $15, ($20 at the door), $10 students/seniors.

Visit www.massbottlebill.org to buy tickets.

Cosponsored by: The Sierra Club, MASSPIRG, MassAudubon, Environmental League of Mass., Emerald Necklace Conservancy, Surfrider Massachusetts Chapter, Mass Climate Action Network, South Shore Recycling Cooperative, the League of Women Voters - Mass., and the Charles River Conservancy.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: The Battle for the Bottle Bill, Starring Comedian Jimmy Tingle
